fields.name: OsFamily
fields.description: Possible values are: 2 - OS Family 2, equivalent to Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1. 3 - OS Family 3, equivalent to Windows Server 2012. 4 - OS Family 4, equivalent to Windows Server 2012 R2. 5 - OS Family 5, equivalent to Windows Server 2016. 6 - OS Family 6, equivalent to Windows Server 2019. For more information, see Azure Guest OS Releases (https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/cloud-services-guestos-update-matrix/#releases).

fields.name: OsVersion
fields.description: The default value is * which specifies the latest operating system version for the specified OS family.
